payload.description: Create MobileBlockAdder.jsx - mobile-optimized block type selector with camera icon FIRST and larger. Props: onAddBlock, mode ('empty'|'compact'|'fab'). Empty mode: 2x3 grid (fits 320px), Compact mode: horizontal scroll with snap points, FAB mode: radial menu. All buttons 44px minimum. Camera, Text, Image, Video, Link, Document order.
payload.context: Replaces InlineBlockAdder on mobile (<640px). Uses CameraIcon, PhotoIcon, VideoCameraIcon, LinkIcon, DocumentTextIcon from @heroicons/react/24/outline. Horizontal scroll uses overflow-x-auto with snap-x snap-mandatory. Gap-2 between buttons. Brand colors optio-purple/optio-pink.
